description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Feeling nostalgic for a classic arcade shmup? Want to just sit back and blast some baddies? Then Flyby is the game for you! Fly across space and take on an endless wave of enemies. Earn powerups. Keep track of high scores!
description.short: Feeling nostalgic for a classic arcade shmup? Want to just sit back and blast some baddies? Then Flyby is the game for you! Fly across space and take on an endless wave of enemies. Earn powerups. Keep track of high scores!
